events.comment:
Adjust the angle before returning, becausse in the function LookTo:
Sprite.Angle() is alter in a way that result in more than 360 or less than -360
Here is returned a number between -180 and 180

Adjust the angle before returning, becausse in the function LookTo:
BackSprite.Angle() is alter in a way that result in more than 360 or less than -360
Here is returned a number between -180 and 180

eventsBasedObjects.description:
Resource visuals.
To work you need to: 
Create an object called "BulletName" + "Ammo" (the bullet reference).
Append the resource behavior to the object.
Add the new object in "Ammo" group.
eventsBasedObjects.name: Resource

eventsBasedObjects.description:
Trails visual for ground.
To work you need to:
Attach the "Ground Trail" behavior to the object that will leave the marks.
Create an object called "GroundTrail" + "Objectname" (the object that will leave the marks).
Add the object to "LeaveGroundTrails" group.
eventsBasedObjects.name: GroundTrails

eventsBasedObjects.description:
Make an explosion that can interact with other entities.
To work you need to: 
Create an object called "Explosion" + "BulletName" (the bullet that create the explosion).
Append the explosion behavior to the object.
Add the new object in "Explosions" group.
eventsBasedObjects.name: Explosion
